attributes.action: Stop the replacement of the Royal Crest with the EU sign on all new birth/marriage/death certificates
attributes.additional_details:
Shockingly, the EU emblem is to be stamped on all birth certificates within three years.
The Royal crest will be replaced on birth, marriage and death certificates
This is a Brussels plot to brand Britons EU citizens and not British Citizens.
We demand that the government STOP this plan now - that they forcefully reject the proposal.
